name: Playing in Traffic
description:
Play as a guy who really loves to run in traffic. How long can you survive on the road without getting run over! Challenge your friends to see who can live the longest.

*Disclaimer there is no way to challenge your friends in game

*There is no way to keep track of your score in game

*There is no way to win

Developer Thoughts:

First videogame made ever. Had a lot of fun stumbling with the code and trying to make some levels. Creating games is harder then playing them but, i felt like i learned a lot here.  Look out for an update to this later in the future where its... more of a video game.  

Thank you for anyone who played this game.
